name: ESCAPE FROM MEDIEVAL TOWER! - 3D FPS Game
name_original: ESCAPE FROM MEDIEVAL TOWER! - 3D FPS Game
description:
An integrated group project by me and the team! I was responsible for designing the game-level environment, some game mechanics, editing cutscenes, and also making the trailer video by using Unity and CapCut Pro. 

"Escape from Medieval Tower!" is a third-person shooter (TPS) game. The game consists of 4 levels, and the game environment is designed with the theme of medieval European architecture. The game's background story is the player wakes up in an unfamiliar room and found that the Medieval tower is patrolled by alien enemies. They prevent the player from finding the portal key, they can attack the player, and cause the player's health to be deducted. The player needs to explore the map, find the key to open the portal, and escape to the next level.

In addition to shooting, the game levels of this game also add some puzzle elements. The player needs to think and solve the puzzles to find the portal key. This kind of gameplay can increase the difficulty of the game level and increase the playability of the game. The player can also improve their problem-solving skills by playing the game. For example, the stairs of a tower castle do not necessarily lead to higher floors. Players need to observe and explore on their own to reach higher floors. In this game, the portal key is hidden in a treasure chest, so the player needs to explore the environment of the whole game level and destroy the treasure chest by shooting to find the portal key.
